title: EPIC TOWN ASSAULT - Napoleon Total War Gameplay
description:
Napoleon Total War Gameplay - War has broken out in Europe!  Sweden and France are on the march to take out a town under control Austrian - Prussian forces.  What is about to unfold is a bloody mess for regional control.  Enjoy the battle :D 

If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D
